1370: Salomon moved to Uterechse straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Alene at age 20 in 1370.
1374: Had a daughter with Alene, Ymmekine, at age 24.
1375: Had a daughter with Alene, Marisseis, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Alene, Aleydis, at age 28.
1380: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 3 years old.
1381: Had a son with Alene, Hetselo, at age 31.
Lost son Hetselo when Hetselo was 1 years old.
1386: Lost daughter Ymmekine when Ymmekine was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
